description: Mateo came prepared to battle the Crystal Onix with his Cloyster. Mateo thought that the Crystal Onix would be weak against Water attacks but Mateo`s Cloyster`s Water Gun bounced right off it. After trying to use multiple failed Water Gun attacks, Mateo`s Cloyster was knocked out by the Crystal Onix`s powerful Tackle attack.
name: Parshen (Isao)
